DOC.detailed_description: Osteoarthritis involve wear cartilage within joint . It affect joint body , commonly affect joint hand , hip , knee , spine . Over last year , new medicine call hyaluronan use treat osteoarthritis . Hyaluronan man-made preparation protein complex occur naturally joint often low people osteoarthritis . Although hyaluronan use million people knee osteoarthritis , yet FDA approve use thumb . The purpose study determine safety effectiveness hyaluronan relieve arthritis symptom base thumb compare corticosteroid local anesthetic . Specifically , study evaluate pain relief , patient satisfaction , functional outcome among participant . Participation study last 26 week . Screening include questionnaire x-ray affected thumb . Eligible participant randomly assign one three treatment : two hyaluronan injection , one corticosteroid injection plus one local anesthetic injection , two local anesthetic injection . Participants receive injection base thumb , first injection follow second injection week later . There five study visit occur baseline Weeks 2 , 4 , 12 , 26 . All study visit include questionnaire , except Week 2 study visit , also include examination evaluation affect thumb . Photographs thumb take baseline . The injection occur baseline Week 2 . At Weeks 8 20 , questionnaire mail participant complete . Upon complete study , participant option receive continue treatment another round hyaluronic injection .
